snippet.title: Crusader Kings II: Sons of Abraham Features Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the expansion: http://www.crusaderkings.com/buy

The air is thick with incense and prayer as the arch angels of grand strategy at Paradox Interactive and Paradox Development Studio today release Crusader Kings II: Sons of Abraham. Strategy gets spiritual as the divine fifth expansion for globally acclaimed strategy/RPG Crusader Kings II celebrates the three holy Abrahamic religions; Christianity, Islam and Judaism. Power in the name of the one true god is the psalm of the day!
